title: Persuading Perfection
description: A steamy brother's best friend romance with an accidental pregnancy that blows apart everything."I've been sleeping with my brother's best friend. It was supposed to be a secret. Simple. Easy. And oh, so good. But now I'm holding the pregnancy test wondering what the hell we're going to do. My brother is going to lose his mind." ~ Jade, aka, the dead sister once my brother finds out.Zachary Calloway was the master of broken hearts and completely off limits.Except his smooth talking sexy ways were irresistible, landing me in over my head.Jade Lauder was supposed to be a secret. No one could ever know the times we shared.Except here she stood with the biggest change in our lives.Years of secrets will be revealed.Years of heartache will come back to deliver a bitter sting.Years of friendships will be demolished.Years of lies will be exposed.All for something we couldn’t deny.The broken heart I never intended to give her stands between us.With no more secrets, it’s time to persuade her to give me a second chance.A second chance at loving her…And this time, I’m not letting go. Every book in the Debonair series is a full length standalone with witty banter, broken rules, and happy ever afters.In the Boundaries (Easton & Zoey)Persuading Perfection (Zach & Jade)Seductive Secrets (Max & Avery)
author: T.C. Matson
